title: Why is Athrotec© not combined with Diclofenac potassium but sodium? - Quora

response.answer_text: To avoid the NSAIDS causing potassium levels increasing. Clinical studies as well as post-marketing observations have shown that NSAIDs can reduce the effect of diuretics. Concomitant treatment of ARTHROTEC with potassium-sparing diuretics may be associated with increased serum potassium levels, thus making it necessary to monitor the latter.
